112.content:
One morning Julie Makimoto woke up in her bed. She had a sleepover with her best friend Runo Misaki the night before, Runo was sleeping on her floor. Julie giggled as she felt a famillier rumble in her belly. She bent over and then....

PHRLRRRRFRFFRRRLPRRAARPT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Julie silently laughed her head off as she smelled the toxic stink that made its way out of her bottom. Julie secretly found farts hillarious (especialy her own). But this smell was so strong it could wake the dead.

Does Runo Wake up?
112.title: She's just naturaly gassy

choices: Gotta poop, no time to look!
1121.content:
As Runo Misaki wakes up, she notices a horrible smell. She was about to say something only to be interrupted with Julie sitting on her face. "MMMPH!" Runo tried to say. "What's that, darling? I can't here you!" Julie said as she...
PPPPPRRRRAAAABBBBTTTTTT!
"Oh, so sorry," Julie said as she laughed. She looks to check if Runo is still alive or not and she sees...
1121.title: She wakes up

11213.content:
"Hey Runo, you okay?" Julie sounded worried.

Suddenly a sharp pain stabbed her belly.

"Urrngh" Julie ran to the bathroom and shut the door. She stripped her pants and underwear, sat on the toilet and......

*BRLLRLORRRFFRPRPRAARRSPLORT*

Julie let out a massive fart that shook the toilet. Julie laughed sp hard she wound up farting again, shaking the toilet.
11213.title: Gotta poop, no time to look!

choices: Prepare Runo to be her living toilet
112132.content:
"Hmm?" Julie thought as she heard the door being knocked. She opened it to see Runo. "Julie, what are yo-" "Now, now," Julie interrupted as she pulled Runo into the bathroom with her, "Calm down. Here, I'll shut you up for you." Julie said as she put Runo on the floor and sat on her face with her bare bottom. "I still have to poop, you know?" Julie said, "I don't want to make a mess on the floor, so can you be my toilet please?" "Mmm!" A voice of disapproval came from under Julie's butt, but she ignored and farted a really wet one!
PPLLLLLLLLLLBBBBBBTTTTTTT!!!!!!
It was so wet, bits of diarrhea went onto Runo's face! And the smell of the fart and the diarrhea combined was enough to make Runo faint. "My, my, that was fun," Julie said as she stood up to...
112132.title: Runo knocks on the door

1121321.content: Prepare Runo to be her living toilet she waits a few moments for Runo to wake before sitting as Runo gasps in surprIse and gets her face covered by Julie's butt and ends up getting a mouth full of poop at that very same time gagging at not only the stink now but the tast. But does she continue to use Runo as her living toilet
1121321.title: Prepare Runo to be her living toilet
